name: Paint Bar x Aisle | Singles Mixer
description:
Join us for a fun Paint Party + Singles Mixer in association with Aisle \-
where you paint with like-minded singles! Unwind and get creative with easy-
to-follow instructions and all painting supplies provided. Perfect for
beginners or experienced painters alike. Enjoy an afternoon of cocktails,
colours and conversations with interesting singles like you.

📍Location: 1 Bar House Kitchen (1BHK), 56, Raj villa, 5th cross, 60 Feet Rd,
6th Block, Koramangala, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560095

Find directions to 1 Bar House Kitchen (1BHK) here ->

name: Tulip Fields at Roastea, Koramangla
description:
Unleash your inner artist at our **Acrylic on Canvas Painting Workshop**!
Whether you're a beginner or a seasoned painter, you'll create your own
vibrant masterpiece using acrylic paints on canvas. Our team will guide you
every step of the way—no experience needed! Just come ready to have fun and
explore your creativity.

Let’s make some art together! 🌈✨

> Step by step guidance by an artist  
> 12 by 16 inch canvas each  
> Beginner friendly  
> Children are welcome for all workshops  
> Includes a non alcoholic beverage & snacks per person from Roastea - Curated
> Coffee And Tea Artisans
Location : Roastea - Curated Coffee And Tea Artisans  
Find directions to the location here ->

name: Fluid Art X Pickleball with Ferrohub Sports
description:
**Paint meets play!** Join us for a vibrant Fluid Art session, followed by a
fun round of Pickleball. No experience needed—just come ready to swirl,
splash, and smash!

Let’s make some art together! 🌈✨

> Step by step guidance by an artist  
> Each person gets an MDF piece to work on, followed by a pickleball session!  
> Beginner friendly  
> Children are welcome for all workshops  
> Beverages will be available on purchase  
> Dress sporty!!
Flow of event :  
> First 15 minutes : Entry and introductions  
> 45 minutes : Fluid art session  
> 15 minutes : Break to network  
> 1 hour : Pickleball sessions
Location : FerroHub Sports Millers Pickleball  
Find directions to the location here ->
